Posts.Content: Hi everyone has anyone heard of this treatment just read about it been launched in a Sunday paper. Apparently R1 is a cooling gel applied to the skin after radiotherapy and R2 is a moisturiser that protects the skin from damage. Have had 6 rads skin starting to turn pink. Does anyone have any information on these products? Tilly7
Posts.Title: R1 and R2 treatments for skin damage caused by radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Lee, Going to ask my Gp for a script. Had 8 rads thought I had got away without  any side effects now  my skin has started to go pink and feel warm . So hope R1 and R2 will help. Let me know how you get on. Tilly
Posts.Title: R1 and R2 treatments for skin damage caused by radiotherapy

Posts.Content: I used R1 and R2  and found them very good. My skin had started to go pink when I started using these products the pinkness disappeared. I did not use any other products with them.  Tilly7
